BootstrapBlazorApp.Shared.Pages.Index.PageDescription: This app demonstrates variants of the Blazor app and standalone "Classifiers" web service, which are developed on open source .NET technologies at the end of 2021. The web service conforms to OpenAPI specification .

with Visual Studio 2022
on Windows 10+
using GitHub

on Windows
Also supported
on Linux, macOS
BootstrapBlazorApp.Shared.Pages.Index.CardUIFrameworkBody:
UI Framework
Blazor Server
Running on the client side in the browser is also supported as Blazor WebAssembly
BootstrapBlazorApp.Shared.Pages.Index.CardUIComponentsBody:
UI Components
BootstrapBlazor
A set of enterprise-class UI components based on Bootstrap and Blazor
